website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality British-made turntable with a sleek, modern look and excellent playback.
pros: Though it doesn't have a built-in preamp, this turntable is otherwise easy to set up and ready to go out of the box
High-quality manual belt-driven model appeals to beginners and audiophiles alike
cons: Speed can't be adjusted without removing the whole platter
Some reported a whining sound from the motor after a few months

customer_reviews.title: Impressed but annoyed.
customer_reviews.text: Although I am very impressed with this turntable. However after 30 mins playing time there was evidence of a squeaking noise from the turntable. Having switched off the motor and rotating the turn table by hand there was no squeaking noise. I detached the drive belt from the platter and when I switched on the motor the squeaking was evident. Can the seller please advise on how to resolve this please. Or is this a defect that needs to be attended to.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Dodd

customer_reviews.title: Bought a record player for over £100 four years ago ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought a record player for over £100 four years ago when i took my record collection out of the loft. Quite a few of them were jumping when played on it, which i put down the the 30 years plus age of the collection. Bought this player and going through the collection and not a single jump so far. Really impressed what a hundred quid more has got me!
customer_reviews.author: Dinesh

customer_reviews.title: 1st class turntable
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with this turntable. Comes with phono cable and everything needed ready to go. It does have a plastic cover which isn't clear in the photograph
customer_reviews.author: Mr G Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to any hi-fi
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a Pro-Ject Elemental, which suffered from power supply problems (my 2nd Pro-Ject deck, 1st one died in similar fashion). For me the sound is more detailed, refined. I was supplied with a Euro mains supply. Contacted the supplier and they offered great customer service, replying and rectifying promptly. All in all a great turntable, no hesitation in recommending.
customer_reviews.author: Dusky Plums

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with broken platter
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely disappointed that my planar 1 arrived with a broken platter. Im shocked that it could leave the factory with this defect (see picture).
customer_reviews.author: Nick Savva

customer_reviews.title: My records sound great
customer_reviews.text: After a lot of research, the wife bought me this for my birthday to replace my vintage Beogram 1000 that finally bit the dust. What a fantastic turntable this is. Sounds great straight out of the box and even better after a few hours of use. Looks good with a high quality finish and minimalist style. It’s a perfect fit with my vintage Yamaha amp and speakers and the fitted Carbon cartridge and stylus is only £27 when it needs replacing. Unless you are raging audiophile with a system costing ££££‘a, the Rega Planar 1 is all you need for your records to sound great.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Best sub £300 turntable.
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to set up. Pleasant look. The sound is very open at the top end, with good separation reaching down well into the mid/bass range. The bass is fast and taut and will go as low as you want to with just the default stylus. I played the 1812 overture which is well known for having frequencies down to around 8hz I believe, from the cannons. This turntable pulled it off convincingly. Best turntable under £300. I.M.O.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Heron

customer_reviews.title: Excellent turntable!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned cheap and expensive turntables before. When it was time to purchase a new one, I wanted something of quality but didn’t want to spend a huge sum of money. I did plenty of research before deciding upon the Rega Planar 1. It both looks and sounds fantastic and I consider that it represents great value for money. I believe that I made the right decision and would not hesitate to recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. P Nuttall

customer_reviews.title: Maximum bang for your Buck
customer_reviews.text: The P1 is a true audiophile turntable and widely recognised as such. Simple to set up and play, no messing around setting up anti skate or balancing the tone arm , it’s already done for you. Simply slide the tone arm weight on all the way to the stop , attach the dust cover and away you go. There are two schools of thought on the dustcover up/ down when playing or off. I personally didn’t attach the cover so it’s lift on/off and prefer it this way (no vibrations off the cover when playing) . At this price it’s a steal and seriously worth the investment if you want maximum bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound for a relatively cheap turntable
customer_reviews.text: I love this turntable. It looks beautiful, is extremely easy to assemble and sounds amazing for the price. I upgraded from a Sony PS-LX300USB and the two biggest differences I noticed were the sound quality and the build quality. The sound from this turntable is so much richer than my previous turntable and the quality of the construction makes it a thing of beauty. It's simple, elegant design makes it very attractive to me. 100% would recommend this as a starter turntable and should fulfil 99% of vinyl enthusiasts needs.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Rylance

customer_reviews.title: Does not spin.
customer_reviews.text: Only just installed it as we moved house so decided to keep it safely in its original packaging. Does not start. Returns window has now closed so we are stuck with an expensive box that does not work.
customer_reviews.author: AbB

customer_reviews.title: Sounds even better than it looks!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first turntable since the 70’s. Coupled to a Marantz amp & wharfedale speakers I was blown away from the first track. As someone who listens to music every day , usually streamed through quality equipment, I could not believe how much better, warmer & deeper music could be!!!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Y.

customer_reviews.title: Check the connections on your music system
customer_reviews.text: Great turntable but check if your music system needs a pre-amp. I tried to put this into my Ruark R4 mark 3 and found it would not work unless I cranked the volume right up and even then the sound quality was poor. I needed a pre-amp to sort out the signal increase. School boy error. My teenage sons love the physicallity of loading a record and placing the stylus. Its a quality turntable. Just check your conections.
customer_reviews.author: Mr M Wheaton

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: This turntable was recommended by a friend, he researched, it based upon sound versus cost I listened to his unit, thought it very good, checked his research found it to be accurate so bought one, dug out the old vinyl and had a happy Sunday reliving memories on a surprising price of kit!...not s Tracy no rumble good clear sound!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent all round
customer_reviews.text: One of the best ratings on the internet in this price bracket, well packaged, easy to commission and sounds great. I am told by my friend Mike who is a real AUDIO freak that this was an excellent choice because all of the component parts can be upgraded if you want to take it to the next level. I am very very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Grace

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy.
customer_reviews.text: After a disappointing start, when I had to send the first one I bought back, due to it being packed upside down and making strange noises when I tried to set it up. I got the second one and what a difference being packed properly makes. Easy set up and a great sounding deck. I can’t fault it as it’s as good, if not better than a lot of decks twice it’s price.
customer_reviews.author: Rory

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best.
customer_reviews.text: The is the best record player bar none. I have had players twice the cost and don't come anywhere near the sound quality of this. Buy it, you will thank me.
customer_reviews.author: C. Erroch

customer_reviews.title: A great reintroduction to my old vinyl collection
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly via DPD and had it quickly playing 5 minutes after opening the box, great service by HiFix. Simple to get going and clear sound. The only negatives are having to lift the turntable deck to switch between 33rpm and 45rpm and the arm does not return once reached the end of the record, not a hardship I appreciate.
customer_reviews.author: MR C TOWNSEND

customer_reviews.title: Top replacement for old turntable.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my son to replace my 30 year old Technics which finally died. Took him 2 mins to set up and the sound quality is awesome. Sure there are more expensive ones out their but I doubt the sound difference would be noticeable. Would highly recommend . Also it was delivered 3 days early which was also a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: jason b

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Turntable
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great and very simple to set up - takes just a couple of minutes. Moving the belt to change speed is a minor irritation but shouldn’t put anyone off. Worth noting that there’s no phono stage built in, so you need a separate one (e.g. the Rega Fono Mini A2D Mk2) or an integrated amp with one built in.
customer_reviews.author: Min

customer_reviews.title: Simply awesome
customer_reviews.text: It was simple to set up, sounds and looks great. I had a slight issue with the arm not lifting off the record when I used the lever at the end of each record but I soon remedied that with the aid of a small allen key. Very happy with this deck.
customer_reviews.author: ministergerry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and sounds great, my husband is very happy and playing records he has not listened too for 30 years, he has linked it to our Sonos system so it can be played throughout the house.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy H

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new turntable to connect to a old Cambridge Audio amp. To get back to listening to vinyl. Spent sometime reading reviews of medium priced turntables. This model good price and very easy to set up. Just needed to add a compact phono amplifier and ground wire. Fantastic sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Edmund Lock

customer_reviews.title: Analogue still rules!
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace an old Marantz deck. The difference is like chalk and cheese. With the Rega you feel you are involved in the music. Can't recommend this highly enough. Sound is far superior to any CD.
customer_reviews.author: eddiet

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound quality and great all round upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I decided after a fair bit of research to upgrade from my old ion pro turntable to a Rega Planar 1 and I’m so glad I did. I read a lot of reviews and I don’t know why I didn’t make the upgrade much sooner. Sound quality is fantastic and with hardly any setup required I plugged it into my Sony amp and away it went. Delighted with my purchase and service, arrived promptly and well packaged too. Can’t recommend enough.
customer_reviews.author: Ewan Houghton

customer_reviews.title: Epic sound for the money. Nothing better at this price.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding quality, easy set up. Just bear in mind you need a phono stage to run it if you don’t have one built into your existing amplifier.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Surprise birthday present
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for his birthday. He is highly delighted having a turntable again.He reckons his vinyl sounds great on this product. He is planning on updating his speakers and amp in the future to get full advantage of the turntable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install and configure
customer_reviews.text: When I got this to replace an older turntable I was interested to see how it would work. The product looks good and was very easy to install. The sound form it is much better than my old deck. I am very pleased with this as an entry level deck.
customer_reviews.author: Owen Brazell

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with everything
customer_reviews.text: Great product, well packaged and promptly delivered. Easy to set up and a joy to used. Really please.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Best in its class!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous sound, hearing hi hats & guitar kneck slides I've never heard before. Be sure to do it justice & make sure you've got decent entry level speaker cable. Only for stars as I have a slight issue with rubber that is on arm rest. Will contact seller for fix.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PLAYER. It's beautiful
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING PLAYER. It's beautiful. Needs various added bits of course but fab player (&I'm quite fussy). Comes with a lid.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set-up and sounds great
customer_reviews.text: Debated getting slightly more expensive ProJect Carbon however this is great, struggled a bit to get it completely level but plays everything nicely. Set-up really straight forward.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: A Great British product. Delivered from Analogue Seduction.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this turntable. It was between the Rega and the similar Pro-Ject. Read some reviews and watched some videos of the two and the Rega edged infront. Delivery from Analogue Seduction was very fast and tracking was updated regularly .
customer_reviews.author: Sean Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound!
customer_reviews.text: Great Turntable for the money. Plays my vinyls in a nice crisp sound. The only thing I did not like was the cheap felt slipmat but this can easily be replaced for about £12. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Luke Baldacchino

customer_reviews.title: Great peace of tech
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husbands birthday. The pros it’s sleek and sounds great and bonus my husband loves it. Negatives My knowledge on Technology is limited, on opening his present the lack of pre amp put a dampers on it. It meant we had to order one before use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stunning for the price
customer_reviews.text: I decided to upgrade my old Duel turntable and starting looking for the best I could afford in my budget. I've literally set it up in 5 minutes and I'm absolutely staggered. It sounds amazing!!! From Pantera to Fleetwood Mac it delivers. For the price it feels like I've ripped off Rega for £250. Dont even think about it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Noisy transformer
customer_reviews.text: Reasonable turntable for the money. East plug and play. No 33/45 switch have to take platter off and move belt between the drive wheels. Transformer power supply hums very loudly which is quite irritating. For this alone I wouldn’t recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Minimalistic excellence made so easy.
customer_reviews.text: Occasionally a product redefines quality in the Hi Fi world, this is one of those.
customer_reviews.author: Neogoonhead

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Deck for the money
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with this, easy to set up and sounds perfect twinned with Marantz Amp & Klipsch passive speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Paul R Hawkings

customer_reviews.title: P1 GREAT SOUND Value??
customer_reviews.text: Great product but the quality of finish was poor acrylic cover all marked with swirls and scratches
customer_reviews.author: P Clements

customer_reviews.title: Great deck
customer_reviews.text: Excellent turntable, easy to set up and use straight from the box,great way to listen to vinyl again.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony R O`Brien

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value
customer_reviews.text: Just so easy to get up and running and a massive improvement on sound quality from my previous NAD turntable I had for about 30years! Simple, sounds amazing, good price, you really can't ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: loondoob

customer_reviews.title: All you need.  I’ve had three of them.
customer_reviews.text: You can’t beat these. My son is very happy. I have a 3 which replaced a highish end £2000 turntable. It’s just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality and almost no jumping on the records, looks good to. Poor instructions, there is still one lever that I have no idea what it does.Not keen on the manual speed change arrangement, but I hardly ever play 45s now so not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: robert shimield

customer_reviews.title: Vinyl is back!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good looking and quality sounding deck for those returning to vinyl. The deck needs to be run-in for a while to wear-in the mechanism, then it is totally smooth and quiet. Paired with Onkyo A9010 and Dali Zensor 3 speakers to produce a great sound.
customer_reviews.author: Andy B

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: It was bought as a Christmas gift and the recipient was delighted wit it
customer_reviews.author: Maria Casey

customer_reviews.title: A bargain Turntable
customer_reviews.text: Superb entry level turntable easy to set up and it sounds great. Had zero issues with it and the drive motor is silent.
customer_reviews.author: GMN 675

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great budget deck. No motor noise and great cartridge and arm.
customer_reviews.author: Dingdong

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just replaced a Stanton deck with one of these after reading the reviews. Worth every penny! Buy one!
customer_reviews.author: Ronz

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound
customer_reviews.text: So happy with purchase. Sound and quality is amazing. Looks great too! Easy to set up (we had speakers, so just ordered with a pre-amp), plugged it all in and wow 🎶 Love it 🎶
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Audiophile sound for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: Just brilliant. For the entry level turntable from rega the sound beats anything you stream or even cd. A warm natural sound. Set up takes 5 minutes. There's something magical about putting a record on. It's the future.......again.
customer_reviews.author: Steve hughes

customer_reviews.title: WORTH EVERY PENNY
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic, easy to set up and it looks beautiful. I played Willie Nelson's record TEATRO and it sounded as though he was live in my living room. What a difference to the rotary ploughs I have had in the past. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Percy-Vere

customer_reviews.title: Great sound.
customer_reviews.text: A great sounding turntable. Easy to setup, can't be faulted for the price.
customer_reviews.author: G. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Volume is to low
customer_reviews.text: Volume is to low, tonearm lifter gave up after a couple of weeks. The stylus isnt the best. I would go 2nd hand vintage if buying now
customer_reviews.author: Lynn keylock

customer_reviews.title: Excellent service
customer_reviews.text: My son is very pleased with the turntable. We received excellent customer service from the seller when we came across a problem so I would definitely buy from this seller again
customer_reviews.author: Jo C.

customer_reviews.title: Unusually exciting
customer_reviews.text: Paired with an Onkyo receiver and a pair of Monitor 5 speakers; the sound quality is excellent but it makes my records taste weird.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Liam Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great, looks amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Sound amazing and looks great. It has built in Phono cables so don't buy a separate set, they are not interchangeable. Also this needs a phono pre-amp. If you don't have one get the Planar+.
customer_reviews.author: Steve L

customer_reviews.title: Great service and a great turntable
customer_reviews.text: Fantastically quick service and delivery and the Rega Planer 1 turntable is a superb piece of kit considering it’s an entry level turntable. Would recommend the seller and the turntable!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark C. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic service and fantastic quality
customer_reviews.text: Came promptly and well packaged. Deck was all set and literally just plugged and played. Sound and build quality is excellent for my old vinyl collection. This was a birthday present and by far my best. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mr G Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Hello vinyl my old friend!
customer_reviews.text: Having not listened to vinyl for a long time this record player is a welcome addition to my home system. It is very easy to set up and the sound quality is fantastic. Thoroughly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: spats71

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and sound of this. I did my research and chose this,can't fault it.!
customer_reviews.author: McShaney

customer_reviews.title: New to vinyls
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing. Sound quality is so natural and detailed. It definitely puts listening to Spotify to shame! Couldn't be happier with my first turntable.
customer_reviews.author: Abbie thomas

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great
customer_reviews.text: Simple but high quality turntable, build is great and the TT does its job well. No gimmicks or features are on the TT, so you know you're paying for the great sound.
customer_reviews.author: lloydyboo1

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. Great classy and stylish looking piece of equipment. We have it connected to our surround system and the vinyl revival has never sounded better.
customer_reviews.author: Karolina

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a birthday present for the vinyl obsessed other half. He loved it, brought a tear to his eye when he opened it! I love it as it looks v stylish.
customer_reviews.author: kellie hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value _great sound and ease of use. The packaging was most impressive and the instructions easy to follow. I can.listen.eoth enjoyment.all of my.old LP's.
customer_reviews.author: Rev B Harry

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time brilliant bit of kit
customer_reviews.text: This is the best turntable had one for years and just replaced it with this the quality of sounds is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Tom F

customer_reviews.title: My old vinyl collection returns from the dead!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, plays my vinyl wonderfully, nothing else to say!
customer_reviews.author: Kalki duff

customer_reviews.title: Quality without breaking the bank.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent entry level turntable. When connecting to an amp it's literally plug and play. Plus there are plenty of upgrades to improve this basic model.
customer_reviews.author: MR S PALMER

customer_reviews.title: Great sound once the missing stylus finally arrived
customer_reviews.text: Great sound once the missing stylus finally arrived. The arm jumps if the needle encounters any small scratch or dirt, but, easy to use, looks good and rings the sound out true as a bell
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, looks really slick and good sound quality. Although I did have to buy an extension phono cable as the one it came with was to short.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An excellent turntable. Very easy and quick to assemble
customer_reviews.text: An excellent turntable. Very easy and quick to assemble. Clear instructions for assembly provided. Excellent sound quality and value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality for the price. Just buy one! Great, clear, rich tones. I’m well impressed & will certainly be buying Rega again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Mr C J Knowles

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate to buy.
customer_reviews.text: I know this deck, bought as a Xmas present. Unbeatable at the price. A real record player for very little money. Delivery exemplary!
customer_reviews.author: R M Ash

customer_reviews.title: Rega Planar Turntable
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my sons 21st as his first proper turntable. Looks great, sounds great and has a great pedigree. Highly recommend! 👍
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Help
customer_reviews.text: Loved product but tryed to use it for the first time and the belt keeps falling off the turn table stopistopping it from turning. Help.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Basically brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely brilliant deck, you can't get a deck any easier to setup, recommended to me by a friend, and I fully endorse his recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for our old vinyl and new . Sounds brilliant . We are so glad we chose this '
customer_reviews.author: gwenyg28

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up. Good sound and plays my record collection nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Bawnbob

customer_reviews.title: Epic
customer_reviews.text: Epic! Very dynamic sound with broad bass tones, for the price couldn't want more!
customer_reviews.author: Ethan bundy

customer_reviews.title: Back to vinyl.
customer_reviews.text: Very well packed. Assembly was straight forward. Using a pro ject pre amp and Onkyo AV amp. Sound is better than expected. Looks amazing as well.
customer_reviews.author: Statikman

customer_reviews.title: excellent. Sounds fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Superb, excellent. Sounds fantastic, I never knew records could sound so good. Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Mr Chris Bullock

customer_reviews.title: Everything I hoped for Simple to set up Sounds
customer_reviews.text: Everything I hoped for Simple to set up Sounds great
customer_reviews.author: jo

customer_reviews.title: Meets expectations
customer_reviews.text: For the money cannot be beaten and made in the uk meets my expectations
customer_reviews.author: Mr Red O;Brien

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, high quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality, easy to set up, excellent design. Very prompt service, well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: DOL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great turntable, easy to set up, sounds and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: TIM MCMILLAN

customer_reviews.title: Excellent turntable but the platter mat could be better.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent turntable. I love the natural warm and detailed sound. I would have given it 5 stars but I feel that the flimsy felt platter mat lets it down as it attracts so much static that it sticks to the records when you lift them off the turntable. I have now replaced the mat with a Tonar Cork mat and no longer have this problem, in fact I think the Tonar mat may made the sound quality even better.
customer_reviews.author: MartinW

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing build and quality control
customer_reviews.text: Just waiting for my third one of these - first one was scratched and poorly finished, the second one had a whirring noise coming from the drive unit. I'm persevering though! Disappointing build and quality control though. If the next one has any issues, I shall have to give up :-(
customer_reviews.author: browser

customer_reviews.title: Lovely turntable but surprised by hard wired interconnect cable
customer_reviews.text: Very nice turntable. Sound quality with original cartridge is good. Lovely to go back old school and get the true warmth from music that digital simply does not give. Slightly surprised that phono interconnect cable is of the fixed permenant variety rather than giving the user the option to use their own interconnect, especially given the price of this unit. I know £250 is not expensive in the grand scheme of audiophile turntables but really was expecting to be able to choose my interconnect.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Jones

customer_reviews.title: Simplicity is its strength
customer_reviews.text: Rega have a well deserved reputation for producing excellent turntables for many years now and this one is no exception. At this price point the Planar 1 can be fully recommended and as a former owner of a Linn LP12/Ekos/Troika who is revisiting vinyl purely to digitise and restore material that is not available on cd I think my choice speaks for itself. Yes, you will also require the pre-amp at £89 if you wish to rip to mac/pc but still an overall good value package for the level of quality achieved.
customer_reviews.author: fallingforstars

customer_reviews.title: Amazing turntable... and now loving my vinyl again !
customer_reviews.text: stars Now enjoying my music like never before ! ByColin Pon 31 March 2018 Verified Purchase Amazing turntable which has brought my old vinyl back to life (..after careful cleaning). Now finding myself buying new vinyl instead of CD's as the audio sounds so much more dynamic. This turntable provides levels of audio depth, clarity and subtlety which are simply amazing. Using with a Marantz PM4000 amp and B&W DM602 speakers and now feeling no desire to upgrade.. A small scratch on the Perspex lid was immediately rectified by Amazon by sending me a new lid (...showing excellent customer service as per usual). Highly recommended turntable for those on a limited budget, but still wanting top-drawer performance !!
customer_reviews.author: Colin P

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working after less two months. All of a sudden, the plate does not move when the play switch is actioned. It looks like a fault to the power unit. Amazon's return wondow closed on the 26th of May, so I might have to get in touch with the company itself. It has been great as long as it worked. Update: Disregard the above. that was caused by the drive belt coming off the spindle. Many thanks to the spelt for the prompt assistance.
customer_reviews.author: matteo

customer_reviews.title: This looks better in real life than in photos
customer_reviews.text: This looks better in real life than in photos. Very pleased with the sound quality paired in this instance with a pro-ject mm phono stage and Cambridge audio cables via my Denon AVR. Super easy to setup. For my budget this was an excellent choice. I have since revisited a lot of my old vinyl and got me so excited to invest into more records. I definitely recommend this turntable.
customer_reviews.author: C.A

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, Quality Fab Turntable
customer_reviews.text: Stylish, fabulous quality and a perfect gift for my son - loves it. Excellent packaging and delivery. Needed to contact the supplier to verify which leads would be needed to plug into amps etc - very helpful - excellent customer service :-)
customer_reviews.author: K Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Gloss balck ....hmmm
customer_reviews.text: Returned this Item as the picture is missleading ...the finish is not monolithic ....its square edges are laminated ....which is a great shame ...
customer_reviews.author: RAF

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Love this turntable!! No crackling sounds or clicking. Just pure perfect music.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is superb and a fraction of the cost of some quality turntables. Well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: diane

customer_reviews.title: Astonishing quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought to revive vinyl and to see if it really did sound as good as I remembered it - it does! Out of the box and connected up in 5 mins. Great response over the full frequency range and no audible motor noise. Very happy! Update: 3 months in and it still sounds superb. Vinyl collection has now grown considerably. Sounds amazing with brand new vinyl and records from 40years ago. Tempted now to go for the performance pack as the reviews are good.
customer_reviews.author: Russ Hartley

customer_reviews.title: Old vinyl albums brought back to life even some old Mono from way back sound great. Nothing but positives all round
customer_reviews.text: My goodness this must be the simplest and easiest turntable to take from the box and just plug in and play. Looks and sound superb. Old vinyl albums brought back to life even some old Mono from way back sound great. Nothing but positives all round. Excellent. Well done Rega
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Like the look of it and setting it up was ...
customer_reviews.text: Early days yet. Like the look of it and setting it up was very simple. Need more time to make proper assessment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Rega Planar 1 Turntable Gloss Black
product_meta.description: The Planar 1 is pretty much a completely new turntable compared to the RP1, the only things kept the same are the drive belt, sub platter and dust cover. It features a brand new RB110 tonearm (which has its bias force preset so it can be set up in seconds) and is fitted with Rega designed bespoke zero play bearings. It's got a 24v low noise synchronous motor which reduces vibration transfer and it is the first entry level turntable Rega has ever made that includes a motor of that kind. The Planar 1 comes with a factory fitted Rega Carbon cartridge which is a high quality moving magnet pick-up cartridge designed to be simple to set up, easy to install, and above all accurately reproduce music.
feature_bullets: New RB110 tonearm with bias force preset
Rega Carbon cartridge is factory fitted
